attributes.action: Remove the use of Child benefit and Child manintence in housing benefit assesments
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am petitioning agaisnt the use of child maintenance and child benefit in the assesment of housing benefit claims. Whether child maintence be pad into a child holding account or vouchers is an idea but it is for the upbringing of children not to pay rent
